page.title: 15OUR SCHOOL NARBERTH C.P.
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS SITUATED NEAR THE MOOR. IT IS ON MOORFIELD ROAD,NEARLY OPPOSITE HILL HOUSE.IT IS QUITE BIG FOR A PRIMARY SCHOOL WITH 150 CHILDREN.IT HAS A PLAYGROUND JUST OUTSIDE IT WITH EITHER A WALL OR FENCING AROUND THE SCHOOL TO STOP PEOPLE FROM TRESSPASSING.IT HAS A NATURE GARDEN WITH A POND IN IT.IT HAS A HALL INSIDE WHERE WE HAVE ASSEMBLIES AND CONCERTS.IT HAS EIGHT CLASSROOMS, THREE INFANTS AND FOUR JUNIORS ROOMS. THERE IS A SMALL YARD ROUND THE BACK BY THE OUTDOOR CLASSROOM WHERE PEOPLE PUT THEIR BIKES IF THEY RIDE TO SCHOOL.THE SCHOOL WAS FIRST BUILT IN THE 1800'S. ANOTHER PART WAS BUILT IN THE 1970'S.
